activities: HRSmart is an application service provider("ASP")that creates custom software applications for its clients to store, manipulate and extract their human resources data. HRSmart does not collect,control,use, or share personal information that clients may upload to an application's database. HRSmart maintains this personal information in a secure environment on behalf of clients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
